p.i: For the benefit of digital users, indexed terms that span two pages (e.g., 52–53) may, on occasion, appear on only one of those pages.

indexList.p: Please note that firm names beginning with initials will be sorted under the main part of the name, e.g. John H. Bennett & Co. will be found under ‘Bennett’.
